nodes.text: Sculpting a Galaxy: Inside the Star Wars Model Shop

Sculpting a Galaxy: Inside the Star Wars Model Shop is a 2006 reference book that examines selected models used in the six Star Wars films. It is available both as a standard hardcover and as a Limited Edition. The standard book contains over 300 images and several multi-page gatefolds.
In addition to the regular book, the Limited Edition includes the following:
